resultAgent_prompt.name: prompt
resultAgent_prompt.description: Prompts the AI for answers about a specific source in the application log. Use this to get analysis on errors or critical events, including their frequency and message details.

error_content.description: Data about a source in the application log, containing EventID, Source, Entry type, Message, and Frequency (how often the error occurs).

frequencyAgent_prompt.name: frequency_prompt
frequencyAgent_prompt.description: Uses AI to give a one-line answer describing how frequent the provided timestamps are. Use this function to summarise error occurrence frequencies from a list of timestamps.

items.description: Timestamp in the format MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss (AM/PM).

frequency_content.description: A list of timestamps representing error occurrences for a source, used to analyse frequency.
